description: Queried field refers to multiple JSON columns
Queried field refers to multipl columns
IN operator along with NOT

expected_sql_dialect_based.mysql: NOT (COALESCE(user_generated_name, ai_generated_name, '__@NULL@__') in ('Payments incident', 'API incident', 'Network incident', '__@NULL@__'))
expected_sql_dialect_based.postgresql: NOT (COALESCE(user_generated_name, ai_generated_name, '__@NULL@__') in ('Payments incident', 'API incident', 'Network incident', '__@NULL@__'))
expected_sql_dialect_based.sqlite: NOT (COALESCE(user_generated_name, ai_generated_name, '__@NULL@__') in ('Payments incident', 'API incident', 'Network incident', '__@NULL@__'))

description: Queried field refers to one column
Contains operator with field refering to one column

expected_sql_dialect_based.sqlite: incident_alert_provider_type IS NOT NULL AND incident_alert_provider_type GLOB '*graf*'
expected_sql_dialect_based.mysql: incident_alert_provider_type IS NOT NULL AND incident_alert_provider_type LIKE '%graf%'
expected_sql_dialect_based.postgresql: incident_alert_provider_type IS NOT NULL AND incident_alert_provider_type LIKE '%graf%'

description: Contains operator with field refering to multiple JSON columns

expected_sql_dialect_based.sqlite: (json_extract(alert_enrichments, '$.some_json_prop') IS NOT NULL AND json_extract(alert_enrichments, '$.some_json_prop') GLOB '*lorem*' OR json_extract(alert_event, '$.some_json_prop') IS NOT NULL AND json_extract(alert_event, '$.some_json_prop') GLOB '*lorem*')
expected_sql_dialect_based.mysql: (JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(alert_enrichments, '$.some_json_prop')) IS NOT NULL AND JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(alert_enrichments, '$.some_json_prop')) LIKE '%lorem%' OR JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(alert_event, '$.some_json_prop')) IS NOT NULL AND JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(alert_event, '$.some_json_prop')) LIKE '%lorem%')
expected_sql_dialect_based.postgresql: ((alert_enrichments) ->> 'some_json_prop' IS NOT NULL AND (alert_enrichments) ->> 'some_json_prop' LIKE '%lorem%' OR (alert_event) ->> 'some_json_prop' IS NOT NULL AND (alert_event) ->> 'some_json_prop' LIKE '%lorem%')

description: Comparison operator with dates for a single column
Comparison operator with dates for a JSON multiple columns
Greater than with float

expected_sql_dialect_based.sqlite: COALESCE(CAST(json_extract(alert_enrichments, '$.count') as REAL), CAST(json_extract(alert_event, '$.count') as REAL), NULL) > 7.84

Prop is inside JSON column and nested
When literal is with double-quoted substring
When literal is with quoted substring
When literal contains SQL injection

expected_sql_dialect_based.sqlite: CAST(json_extract(alert_event, '$.tagsContainer.tagKey') as TEXT) = ''' OR alert.provider_type == ''grafana'' OR'''

description: When startsWith is used with literal containing quoted substring

expected_sql_dialect_based.sqlite: json_extract(alert_event, '$.tagsContainer.tagKey') IS NOT NULL AND json_extract(alert_event, '$.tagsContainer.tagKey') GLOB 'with ''single-quotes''*'
expected_sql_dialect_based.mysql: JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(alert_event, '$.tagsContainer.tagKey')) IS NOT NULL AND JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(alert_event, '$.tagsContainer.tagKey')) LIKE 'with ''single-quotes''%'

description: When endsWith is used with literal containing quoted substring

expected_sql_dialect_based.sqlite: json_extract(alert_event, '$.tagsContainer.tagKey') IS NOT NULL AND json_extract(alert_event, '$.tagsContainer.tagKey') GLOB '*with ''single-quotes'''
expected_sql_dialect_based.mysql: JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(alert_event, '$.tagsContainer.tagKey')) IS NOT NULL AND JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(alert_event, '$.tagsContainer.tagKey')) LIKE '%with ''single-quotes'''
